promoTitle: Change the Station / Mind Made Up
dek: Two reissues from the Manchester veterans track the progress of their post-punk/disco fusions into the 1990s and 2000s—an uneven path, but their freewheeling energy still charms.

title: Bringing the Backline
dek: If Bristol-based songwriter Ellis Jones’ witty yet melancholy final album as Trust Fund has an overarching theme, it’s how deeply disenchanted he feels with making music.
